pages.text: $(li)The Black Irom Golems are strong weapons made to destroy their enemies and can only be found rarely in $(l:patchouli:illagers/raid)Raids$(/l) or in the $(l:patchouli:illagers/illager_centre)Illager Centre$(/l).$(br)$(li)They can shoot fireballs, throw entities in the air, and make you a lot of damage.$(br)$(li)On death they may drop $(l:patchouli:redstone/vanilla/redstone_block)Redstone Blocks$(/l), $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/fire_charge)Fire Charges$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/iron_ingot)Iron Ingots$(/l).
